alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield; Lee (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 3:58PM EST until January 09 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Lee County in central South Carolina... Chesterfield County in central South Carolina... * Until 500 PM EST. * At 358 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Carolina Sandhills Wildlife Refuge, or 18 miles north of Hartsville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Cheraw, Chesterfield, Carolina Sandhills Wildlife Refuge, Cheraw State Park, Northeastern Technical College, Cheraw Municipal Airport, Mcbee, Ruby, Patrick, Chesterfield Ruby Middle School, Cheraw Fish Hatchery, Alligator Fire Station, Middendorf, Bay Springs Fire Station, and Chesterfield Detention Center. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for central South Carolina.
